{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20632v1", "title": "Tx-Rx Mode Mismatch Effects in Gaussian-Modulated CV QKD", "summary": "The impact of technical limitations on pulse shaping used to generate a CV
QKD signal is quantified in terms of the attainable secure key rate.
Optimization of key spectral efficiency for Gaussian-modulated CV QKD with
truncated and discretized root-raised cosine profiles is discussed.", "main_category": "quant-ph", "categories": "quant-ph", "published": "2025-04-29T11:01:11Z"}
